comments:
stack trace:

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
org/eclipse/hyades/execution/runtime/datapool/IDatapoolSuggestedType
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.datapool.internal.util.DatapoolUtil.getVariableTypeI
nfo(DatapoolUtil.java:167)
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.datapool.internal.dialog.DatapoolColumnDialog.create
DialogArea(DatapoolColumnDialog.java:154)

Fixed. Problem was with static method DatapoolPlugin.getString() of 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.datapool plugin. It uses member variable 
resourceBundle instead of calling getResourceBundle() which will create the 
resource bundle first if it's not created yet. IDatapoolSuggestedType 
initializes display strings with DatapoolPlugin.getString() and failed.
